name: Tale of Swords
description:
EARLY ACCESS!

You can claim a copy of the game for a discounted price of $5!

Tale of Swords is a re-imagined take on the legend of the nine-tailed fox. Hack n' slash* your way through this feudal-Japan inspired world infused with the terror of advanced robotics.

You are the embodiment of the nine-tailed fox. Each weapon represents one of your tails. You must reclaim each weapon by slicing your way through hordes of enemies in order to reclaim each sword and become the Kitsune.

*The words "hack and slash" have never been more literal.
